settings.editor: Cooking or cookery is the art, technology and craft of preparing food for consumption with or without the use of heat. Cooking techniques and ingredients vary widely across the world, from grilling food over an open fire to using electric stoves, to baking in various types of ovens, reflecting unique environmental, economic, and cultural traditions and trends. The ways or types of cooking also depend on the skill and type of training an individual cook has.

1 In cooking, a chef's knife, also known as a cook's knife, is a cutting tool used in food preparation. The chef's knife was originally designed primarily to slice and disjoint large cuts of beef. Today it is the primary general-utility knife for most western cooks. A chef's knife generally has a blade eight inches (20 centimeters) in length and 1 1⁄2 inches (3.8 cm) in width, although individual models range from 6 to 14 inches (15 to 36 centimetres) in length.

2

This is a list of cooking techniques. Cooking is the art of preparing food for ingestion, commonly with the application of heat. Cooking techniques and ingredients vary widely across the world, reflecting unique environmental, economic, with cultural traditions and trends. The way that cooking takes place also depends on the skill and type of training an individual cook has.

3 Baking is a method of cooking food that uses prolonged dry heat, normally in an oven, but also in hot ashes, or on hot stones. The most common baked item is bread but many other types of foods are baked. Heat is gradually transferred "from the surface of cakes, cookies, and breads to their centre.

4 Chocolate is a typically sweet, usually brown food preparation of Theobroma cacao seeds, roasted and ground. It is made in the form of a liquid, paste, or in a block, or used as a flavoring ingredient in other foods. Cacao has been cultivated by many cultures for at least three millennia in Mesoamerica.

settings.title: You will be able to cook these dishes in no time
With candied pistachios and warm goat cheese vinaigrette
With shaved Meyer lemon and parmesan truffle reduction
Saffron rice with a variety of seafood, chicken and olives

icon_list.text: 1 (14.75 ounce) can salmon, drained and flaked

settings.title: Pick through the salmon and remove any bones. In a mixing bowl, beat the eggs and add the diced onion, salmon and pepper. Mix thoroughly.
Pick through the salmon and remove any bones. In a mixing bowl, beat the eggs and add the diced onion, salmon and pepper. Mix thoroughly.
It all started as a joke

Thank you so much for a great day learning how to cook authentic thai cuisine and learning about all the herbs you grow yourself.  Everything was so interesting fun and I'll be sure to cook everything we made today for family and friends!  Thanks again!

settings.testimonial_content: Thanks so much for teaching us all your wonderful thai recipes!  Will definitely cook them at home!  It was also great learning about all the things you grow yourself!

Thank you for such a lovely experience – a thai cooking class in Thailand is just awesome!  Thanks for answering all our questions, telling us so much interesting info and helping us to cook authentic thai food!
Thank you so much to welcoming us into your house.  You have succeed to transmitting us your passion of cooking.  We are already excited to cook your fabulous plates to our family.

Thank you for a marvellous morning – I so enjoyed learning about Thai cooking and food and most of all enjoyed your company.  You have such a way about you, I can't describe it but I feel touched by coming here into your family's home.
